name: James E. NIXON, Sr., Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COMMON PLEAS COURT, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Nixon v. Philadelphia County Common Pleas Court

parties: James E. NIXON, Sr., Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COMMON PLEAS COURT, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and Exercise the Court’s King’s Bench Power are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 1177
James E. NIXON, Sr., Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COUNTY COMMON PLEAS COURT, Respondent.
No. 99 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2008.
